long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pryvicy is a data protection extension for your Gmail and or Microsoft Outlook email client that enhances the security of your emails and attachments through a centralised platform.

 
If you receive an encrypted email from a Licensed Pryvicy user, you can install the Pryvicy extension for free, and it will un-encrypt the email for you.
